job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtI am partnered with a company that is pioneering the use of notetaking app recorders Their AIpowered collaborative works across Zoom Google Meet and Microsoft Teams to help teams record transcribe search and share meeting notesampnbspIn addition they are making virtual meetings accessible to all employees  allowing team members with disabilities to participate in a world that is now dominated by virtual meetingsltpgtltpgtThey are currently in their Series A Funding Round looking to rapidly grow their team over the course of the next yearampnbsp The team is located in Mountain View with plans to move back to inperson as soon as they canltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtA few key details Listed below ltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtSkill Requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of experience in Machine LearningltligtltligtStrong programming skills in a scientific computing language such as Python ltligtltligtExperience using frameworks for machine learning and data science like scikitlearn pandas NumPyltligtltligtExperience working with ML tools such as Tensorflow Keras and PytorchltligtltligtExcellent written and oral communication skills and the capability to drive crossfunctional requirements with product and engineering teamsltligtltligtComfortable in a Collaborative Startup environmentltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtNice to haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPhD in Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence NLP or similarltligtltligtExperience with MLOps systemsltligtltligtA drive to keep up and build on cutting edge researchltligtltligtExperience with Natural Language ProcessingltligtltligtLeadership experienceltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtOffer ExpectationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtCompetitive SalaryltligtltligtAwesome BenefitsltligtltligtPotential to grow alongside a fastpaced teamltligtltulgt
